rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language describing viral characteristics ('can change very quickly').
The segment discusses human exposure, vaccine immunity, and how H5N1 would look different to the body.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports a fact about immunity without explicit calming language.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Discusses flu vaccines ('flu vaccines help build immunity') which are preparedness measures, without active reassurance.
